description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.
name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api

improvement: The current tool's description is somewhat generic, and it doesn't highlight its advantages over other tools. The 'next 14 day' range is also not unique to this tool. I will revise the description to emphasize its ability to provide a broad range of weather information for a given city.
description: Get comprehensive weather forecasts for any city worldwide with our API, including astronomy data, daily and hourly forecasts, and more. With up to 14 days of coverage, you'll have all the insights you need to plan your day or week. Our API is designed to provide accurate and reliable weather information, making it an essential tool for anyone who needs to stay on top of the latest conditions.
name: weatherapi_com_city_weather_forecast_api

improvement: The current tool's description is somewhat generic and doesn't highlight its advantages over other tools. The 'up to 14 days' range is also not unique to this tool.
